title: $15+ Airfare Sale from Frontier, Today Only
text:
$15+ Airfare Sale from Frontier, Today Only $15+ Airfare Sale from Frontier, Today Only September 2, 2015 1:03pm   
Breaking news: Today only, you can book flights to major cities across the U.S. for just $15 each way (shown as $30 round-trip below) on Frontier. You'll have to jump on the deal fast, and plan travel even faster as the travel window at these extremely affordable rates is during September 2-16 (with the exception of September 8). The sale ends at 11:59 p.m. ET tonight, September 2.

Breaking news: Today only, you can book flights to major cities across the U.S. for just $15 each way (shown as $30 round-trip below) on Frontier. You'll have to jump on the deal fast, and plan travel even faster as the travel window at these extremely affordable rates is during September 2-16 (with the exception of September 8). The sale ends at 11:59 p.m. ET tonight, September 2. 
Note that Frontier is promoting this sale with rates as low as $1, but that excludes mandatory taxes and fees, estimated at $14, hence the $15 one-way rates.   We found the best prices for   this sale by   this promotion on the airline's sale page . Pros:
